attributes.action: Pass legislation making it an offence for any horse, pony, donkey, pig, sheep or cow to roam in the New Forest National Park without a reflective collar or other reflective marking being securely affixed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present animals are allowed to roam in the New Forest without reflective collars. This is a danger to other road users, particularly in the winter months. The motorist is owed a duty of care by other road users and a reflective marking, either a collar, a harness or a painted marking would ensure the animal can be clearly seen at night.
